name: Broccoli-Quinoa Casserole
author: TinaJ
summary: A high-protein dish made with rotisserie chicken--and a great way to sneak some veggies in, too!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of broccoli soup
1 ¼ cups shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese
3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Rinse quinoa in a fine-mesh sieve until water runs clear
Combine 1 1/2 cups water, quinoa, and salt in a small saucepan
Reduce heat to low and cover
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Coat a shallow 8-inch baking dish with cooking spray
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add broccoli, cover, and steam until tender, about 3 minutes
Combine chicken, cream of broccoli soup, Cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, milk, stevia powder, pepper, and nutmeg in a large bowl
Spoon mixture into the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until top is bubbly and edges are golden, 35 to 40 minutes
